title: Sets standards for time for the furnishing of certain information to municipalities and community boards by applicants for certain alcohol licenses
summary: Sets standards for the time for the furnishing of certain information to municipalities and community boards by applicants for certain original, renewal, or alteration alcoholic beverage licenses and the applicability of certain public notice requirements.
